forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy. Low around 56, with temperatures rising to around 58 overnight. West southwest wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 67. West wind 9 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
The tranquil morning in Downtown San Francisco unfurls like a well-read novel, with soft hints of clouds drifting through the cool air. The temperature settles around the mid-fifties, a gentle nudge toward sixty, as the west-southwest winds whisper sweet nothings at ten miles per hour. It’s a calm beginning, the horizon subtly illuminated, suggesting that what lies ahead is a sun-drenched day—one where the fog dances away, offering the city a rare chance to bask in sunshine. By afternoon, expect the day to adopt warmer hues, achieving a high in the upper sixties, supported by breezy gusts breaking through at 22 miles per hour.

Dressing in layers will serve you well; a light jacket draped over your shoulders will provide warmth against the morning chill, while comfortable attire beneath keeps you ready for the invigorating embrace of the afternoon glow. As the day unfolds, let the elegance of the city entice you into its parks or along the waterfront. Perhaps take a stroll through the vibrant streets, or indulge in a quiet café, where you can savor the aromas of fresh pastries and rich coffee. The beauty of this day beckons, whether it’s the allure of a leisurely walk or the simple pleasure of watching the world unfold from your favorite vantage point in this enchanting city.
